dataList.content: Good for you, you won. Now stop giving me that look and get out of here.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: You lost most of your clan during the Family Hierarch war, didn't you?
Yeah... so what?! Are you calling me a penniless loser?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: And I'm sure that's what I look like to you, too.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: I don't want your—sorry, every clan member who died in the evaluation to have died for nothing.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: If I show weakness, that means I'm making everyone who participated in the Evaluation look weak.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: So I'm going to win. And I'm going to win without the fertile soil my predecessors have left behind, because their legacy was unjustly nourished by the blood and tears of Hongyuan itself.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Shi Huazhen. You are tenacious, determined, and strong of will.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: That must be why everyone stood by you, down to the last man.
You... you knew my name? ... Ma'am?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: So, what do you think? Wanna make them sing your name in glory for the remaining history of Hongyuan?
